Translations.Text: ninnalkku mele bhadramaya elakasannale nam nirmiccu
kahalam utunna dinamanat. appeal ninnal kuttankuttamayi vannettum
nam'mute takkitukale avar appate kallamakki talli
ella karyavum nam krtyamayi rekhappetutti veccittunt
atinal ninnal anubhaviccukealluka. ninnalkku siksayallateannum vardhippiccu taranilla
ninre nathanil ninnulla pratiphalamayanat. avararhikkunna sam'manam
avan, akasabhumikaluteyum avaykkitayilullavayuteyum nathanan. dayaparan. avanumayi neril sambhasanam natattanarkkumavilla
jibrilum marru malakkukalum aninirakkum dinaman atuntavuka. annarkkum sansarikkanavilla; karunanidhiyaya nathan anuvadam nalkiyavannum satyam parannavannumealike
atatre satyadinam. atinal istamullavan tanre nathankalekk matannanulla margamavalambikkatte

asannamaya siksaye sambandhicc tirccayayum nam ninnalkk takkitu nalkiyirikkunnu. manusyan tanre iru karannalum ceytuveccat neakkikkanum dinam. ann satyanisedhi parayum: "nan mannayirunnenkil etra nannayene.”
avar gheasikkunnu: "enkilatearu tulanna tiriccu peakku tanne.”
visud'dhamaya tvuva talvarayil vecc tanre nathan addehatte viliccu kalpiccatearkkuka
ni pharaveanre atuttekk peavuka. avan atikramiyayirikkunnu
ennitt ayaleat ceadikkuka: “ni visud'dhi varikkan tayyaruntea
“nan ninne ninre nathanilekku valinatattanum annane ninakku daivabhaktanakanum?”
annane janannale orumiccukutti innane vilambaram ceytu
avan prakhyapiccu: nanan ninnalute parameannata nathan
appeal allahu avane pitikuti. maruleakatteyum ileakatteyum siksakkirayakkan
ninnale srstikkunnatea akasatte srstikkunnatea etan kututal prayasakaram? avan atuntakki
atinre vitanam uyarttukayum annane atine kurramarratakkukayum ceytu
atile ravine avan irulullatakki. pakaline irulilninn purattetukkukayum ceytu
i leaka jivitattin alavarra pradhan'yam nalkukayum ceytuvea
ennal ar tanre nathanre padaviye petikkukayum atmavi ne saririkechakalil ninn vilakki nirttukayum ceytuvea
a antya samayatte sambandhicc avar ninneat ceadikkunnu. ateppealanuntavukayenn
atekkuricc antimamaya ariv ninre nathankal matramatre
atine avar kanum nal, ivite oru sayahnamea prabhatamea allate tamasiccittillenn avarkk teannippeakum
athava, upadesam srad'dhikkukayum a upadesam ayalkk upakarikkukayum ceytekkamallea
ennittum ni avanre karyattil asrad'dha kaniccu
oru bija kanattilninnanavane srsticcat. annane kramanusrtam rupappetutti
atuntavunna dinam manusyan tanre saheadarane vetinneatum
marru cila mukhannal ann peati purantirikkum
urappayum it adaraniyanaya oru dutanre vacanam tanne
prabalanum sinhasanattinre utamayute atutt unnata sthanamullavanumanaddeham
urappayum addeham jibriline telinna cakravalattil veccu kantittunt
ennal mululeakaruteyum nathanaya allahu ichikkunnatallateannum ninnalkk agrahikkanavilla
orea atmavum tan neratte pravartticcatum pinnekk marri veccatum entennariyum
allayea manusya, atyudaranaya ninre nathanre karyattil ninne catiyil petuttiyatentan
avanea, ninne srstikkukayum srad'dhayeate cittappetuttukayum, ellam santulitamakkukayum ceytavan
alla; ennittum ninnal raksasiksa natapatikale tallipparayunnu
arkkum marrearalkkuventi onnum ceyyanavatta dinamanat. ann tirumanadhikarameakke allahuvin matramayirikkum
janannalkk alannea tukkiyea keatukkumpeal kuravu varuttukayum ceyyum
nam'mute sandesam otikkelppikkumpeal avan parayum: “it purvikarute peattakkathakalan.”
alla. avar ceytukuttunna kurrannal avarute hrdayannalinmel karayayi parrippiticcirikkukayan
nis'sansayam; a dinattilavar tannalute nathane darsikkunnat vilakkappetum
pinnit avareat parayum: ninnalennum nisedhiccukeantirunna siksayanit
avarute mukhannalil divyanugrahannalute seabha ninakku kantariyam
ataccu mudravecca patrannalile pavitra madyam avar kutippikkappetum
atinre mudra kasturikeantayirikkum. matsarikkunnavar atinayi matsarikkatte
avarute arikilute natannupeakumpeal avar parihasatteate kannirukkumayirunnu
avar tannalute kutumbannalilekk rasiccullasiccan tiriccu cennirunnat
avar satyavisvasikale kantal parasparam parayumayirunnu: "ikkuttar valipilaccavar tanne; tircca.”
satyanisedhikalkk avar pravartticcukeantirunnatin pratiphalam kittikkalinnea enn
at tanre nathann kilppetumpeal!- at annane ceyyan katappettirikkunnuvallea
at atinre nathann kilppetukayum ceyyumpeal! -annane ceyyan at katappettirikkunnuvallea
allayea manusya; ni ninre nathanilekk katutta klesatteate cennettunnavanan; annane avanumayi kantumuttunnavanum
ennal tanre karmapustakam valatu kayyil nalkappetunnavanea
avan tanre vittukarute atuttekk santeasatteate matanniccellum
tirccayayum avan tanre kutumbakkarkkitayil ahladatteate kaliyunnavanayirunnu
ennal urappayum avanre nathan avane suksmamayi niriksikkunnavanayirunnu
atinal ni avarkk neaveriya siksaye sambandhicc vivaramariyikkuka
satyavisvasam svikarikkukayum salkkarmannal pravarttikkukayum ceytavarkkealike. avarkk arutiyillatta pratiphalamunt
avarkk visvasikalute mel oru kurravum areapikkanuntayirunnilla; stutyarhanum ajayyanumaya allahuvil visvasiccu ennatallate
avanea, akasa bhumikalute mel adhipatyamullavanatre. allahu ella karyannalkkum saksiyan
satyavisvasikaleyum visvasinikaleyum mardikkukayum ennitt pascattapikkatirikkukayum ceytavaruntallea, urappayum avarkk narakasiksayunt. cuttu karikkunna siksa
ennal satyavisvasam svikaricc salkkarmannal pravarttikkunnavarkk talbhagattute arukalealukunna svargiyaramannalanullat. atatre atimahattaya vijayam
tirccayayum ninre nathanre pituttam kathinam tanne
ennal; satyanisedhikal ellam kallamakki tallunnatil vyaprtaran
atinal satyanisedhikalkk ni avadhi nalkuka. ittiri neram avarkk samayamanuvadikkuka
keatiya nirbhagyavan atil ninn akalukayum ceyyum
avan tanre nathanre namamearttu. annane avan namaskariccu
ennal ninnal i leaka jivitattinan pramukhyam nalkunnat
avaranam ceyyunna mahavipattinre vartta ninakku vannettiyea
ennal marru cila mukhannal ann prasannannalayirikkum
avar neakkunnille? ottakatte; atine ennane srsticcuvenn
atinal ni udbeadhippikkuka. ni orudbeadhakan matraman
ad janataye ninre nathan entu ceytuvenn ni kantille
avareppeale saktarayearu janata marrearu nattilum srstikkappettittilla
appeal ninre nathan avarkkumel siksayute cattavar varsiccu
ennal manusyane avanre nathan pariksikkukayum, annane avane adarikkukayum anugrahikkukayum ceytal avan parayum: “enre nathan enne adariccirikkunnu.”
ennal allahu avane pariksikkukayum, annane avanre jivitavibhavam parimitappetuttukayum ceytalea, avan parayum: “enre nathan enne nindiccirikkunnu.”
ann narakatte ninnalute atuttekk keantuvarikayum ceyyumpeal; ann manusyan ellam ormavarum. a samayatt orma vannittentu karyam
avan parayum: ayyea, enre i jivitattinayi nan neratte ceytuveccirunnenkil
annalil allahu siksikkum vidham marrarum siksikkukayilla
ni ninre nathankalekk trptippettavanayum trpti netiyavanayum tiriccu celluka
annane enre uttama dasanmarute kuttattil pravesiccu kealluka
avan avakasappettu; tan dharalam dhanam tulaccenn
pinne satyavisvasam svikarikkukayum ksamayum karunyavum parasparam upadesikkukayum ceytavaril ulppetaluman
annane atin dharmatteyum adharmatteyum sambandhicca beadham nalkiyatum
thamud geatram dhikkaram karanam satyatte tallikkalannu
daivadutan avareat parannu: “it allahuvinre ottakam. atinre jalapanam 1 tatayatirikkuka.”
avaraddehatte dhikkariccu. ottakatte aruttu. avarute papam karanam avarute nathan avare onnatankam nasippiccu. siksa avarkkellam orupeale nalkukayum ceytu
avan nasattinirayakumpeal avanre dhanam avann upakarikkukayilla
atinal kattiyeriyum narakattiyinekkuricc nan ninnalkk munnariyipp nalkiyirikkunnu
pratyupakaram nalkappetenta oredaryavum avanre vasam arkkumilla
atyunnatanaya tanre nathanre pritiye sambandhicca pratiksayallate
vaikate tanne ninre nathan ninakku nalkum; appeal ni santrptanakum
ninne anathanayi kantappeal avan ninakk abhayamekiyille
ninne valiyariyattavanayi kantappeal avan ninne nervaliyilakkiyille
ninne daridranayi kantappeal avan ninne sampannanakkiyille
tirccayayum manusyane nam mikavurra ghatanayil srsticcu
satyavisvasam svikariccavareyum salkkarmannal pravartticcavareyumealike. avarkk, arutiyillatta pratiphalamunt
ni kantea? a atima nervaliyil tanneyan
ni kantea? i tatayunnavan satyatte tallikkalayukayum purantirinnu nilkkukayum ceytavanan
sansayam venta; avanit avasanippikkunnillenkil; avanre kutuma nam piticcu valikkuka tanne ceyyum
kallam parayukayum; papam pravarttikkukayum ceyyunna kutuma
arut! ni avan valannarut. ni sastangam pranamikkuka! nam'mute samipyam netuka
tirccayayum nam i khur'anine vidhi nirnayaka ravil avatarippiccu
vidhi nirnayaka rav ayiram masattekkal mahattaraman
a ravil malakkukalum jibrilum iranni varunnu. samasta karyannaleyum sambandhicca tannalute nathanre uttaravumayi
vedakkarum bahudaiva visvasikalumaya satyanisedhikal vyaktamaya teliv vannettum vare tannalute valiyil uraccuninnu
allahuvil ninnulla dutan pavitramaya granthattalukal vayiccu kelppikkunnat vare
vedam nalkappettavar bhinniccittilla. avarkku vyaktamaya teliv vannettiya sesamallate
vidheyatvam allahuvinu matramakki avane matram valippett nervaliyil jivikkanallate avareat kalpiccittilla. oppam namaskaram nisthayeate nirvahikkanum sakat nalkanum. atan ceavvaya jivitakramam
tirccayayum vedakkarum bahudaiva visvasikalumaya satyanisedhikal narakattiyilan. avaratil sthiravasikalayirikkum. avaran srstikalilerram nikrstar
ennal satyavisvasam svikarikkukayum salkkarmannal pravarttikkukayum ceytavarea, avaran srstikalilerram sresthar

avarkk avarute nathankal arhamaya pratiphalamunt. talbhagattute arukalealukunna svargiyaramannal. avaratil ekkalavum sthiravasikalayirikkum. allahu avarekkuricc trptanayirikkum. avar allahuvilum santrptarayirikkum. itellam tannalute nathane bhayappetunnavarkkullatan
annalil janam pala sanghannalayi purappetum; tannalute pravarttanaphalannal neril kanan
atinal, anuttukkam nanma ceytavan at kanum
urappayum avan tanne i nandiketinu saksiyan
sansayamilla; annalil avarute nathan avarepparri suksmamayi ariyunnavanan
appeal arute tulasinre tatt kanam tunnunnuvea
pinne ninnalatine urappayum kannukeant kanukatanne ceyyum
pinnit ninnalanubhavicca sukhanugrahannalepparri ann ninnale ceadyam ceyyum
satyavisvasam svikariccavarum salkkarmannal pravartticcavarum; satyam svikarikkanum ksama palikkanum parasparamupadesiccavarumealike
avanea, dhanam orukkuttukayum at ennikkanakkakkukayum ceyyunnavanan
sansayam venta; avan hutvamayil eriyappetuka tanne ceyyum
anakkare ninre nathan ceytatennaneyenn ni kantille
cuttetutta kallukalkeant a paravakal avare erinnukeantirunnu
athava saityakalatteyum usnakalatteyum yatrayeatulla avarute inakkam
atinal i ka'abamandirattinre nathan avar valippetatte
avarkk visappatakkan aharavum petikku pakaram nirbhayatvavum nalkiyavananavan
atinal ni ninre nathann namaskarikkuka. avann baliyarppikkuka
niscayam ninneat satruta pularttunnavan tanneyan valarravan
ninnalkk ninnalute matam. enikk enre matam
janam kuttankuttamayi daivika matattil katannuvarunnat ni kanukayum ceytal
ninre nathane ni stuticc valttuka. avaneat papameacanam tetuka. tirccayayum avan pascattapam svikarikkunnavanan
abulahabinre iru karannalum nasikkatte. avan nasiccirikkunnu
avanre svattea avan sampadiccatea avanneattum upakariccilla
parayuka: prabhatattinre nathaneat nan saranam tetunnu
parayuka: nan saranam tetunnu, janannalute nathaneat
